casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dexter Leon SURRATT 203P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Joy Strickland, Assistant Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Drew Nelson, Attorney at Law, for Surratt, Dexter Leon.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of August 2018 by State of NC to Deem Response to Petition for Discretionary Review Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
